To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Doji _doji;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_doji = Doji(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_doji.IsReady)
{
    var current = _doji.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.doji = self.Doji(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.doji.IsReady:
    current = self.doji.Current.Value
